description.gold-silver:
An attack that may
cause freezing.
description.crystal:
An attack that may
cause freezing.
description.ruby-sapphire:
Blasts the foe with a snowy
gust. May cause freezing.

Blasts the foe with a snowy
gust. May cause freezing.
description.firered-leafgreen:
Blasts the foe with
a snowy gust.
It may cause

a chilling gust of

It may also freeze
the target.
